org.rakiura.cpn
Class XmlUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.rakiura.cpn.XmlUtil

public final class XmlUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Set of utilities for XML Document processing. This is a class supporting the use of Sun Java XML API (jaxp).

Created: Mon Jun 28 14:51:25 1999

Version:
4.1.0 $Revision: 1.10 $
Author:
Mariusz Nowostawski
